messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Central Command has renamed the station to "Dark Star".

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Central Command has renamed the station to "Starwars".

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: High alert for all staff, a shift in the space time continuum has been detected around the HoP's dog Ian. You are to protect Ian at all costs. I repeat, protect Ian at all costs.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Fuck no, Ian is our lunch

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: A chrono legionnaire has been dispatched to erase Ian, protect Ian or you lose your jobs.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: The legionnaire has nearly got to Ian, protect him

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Ian is gay, runtime is better

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Aditional time shifts seemed to have opened on the other pets in the station, make protecting them your top priority

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Ian, come home boy, I got a big juicy steak for you

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I want to talk to the chrono legionarre, in my office, now

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Staff report in, which pets are still alive? Try to protect them all

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Cap I need to kill the animals or the whole ship will implode, this is for our future

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: We should take then

messages.author: Bridge
messages.body: We should talk then

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Ignore the Legionnaire, he doesn't understand. The animals must be protected, if their bodies fall into the wrong hands our plans are ruined. Your jobs are on the line, and if you fail to take down this legionnaire we will purge the entire station with extreme prejudice.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: WHERE IS THE DEAD LEGIONARRE?

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Status report, now. Send someone to the bridge to report in on each pet's condition.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Where's that report?

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Ian - Dead  Babbe - Alive Runtime - Unknown, Blame Beau Richards Janitors Lizard - unknown All the rest, Unknown

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: We are beginning to mobilise an ERT, sadly it looks as if the syndicate are doing the same. Protect the damn pets.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Well update. I killed another animal to help the time space

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Incinerator.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: ERT team inbound to secure the pets, please don't stand in their way.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Bar.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: *maniacal laugh

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Brig.
